label: Mission & Vision
text:
We envision a world where AI-tools and blockchain technology 100x the number of creators in the
world, from 50M to 500M, ushering in a “golden-age” of accessible creativity for all. Our mission is
to unleash humanities creative potential and unlock individual financial freedom by providing the
network, resources and tools that drive mass adoption around the co-creation, co-licensing, and
co-ownership of digital assets.
mobile_text:

creation, co-licensing, and co-ownership of digital assets.

label: Curate collective
text:
From high-level influencers to up-and-coming content creators, we spent months and months
hand-selecting only the best creators and collectors to provide a safe space for discussions,
debates, and collaborations around all things AI and web3. Cre8ors is centered around eight
core values: inclusivity, mindfulness, transparency, accountability, advocation, fearlessness,
empathy, and creativity.

label: Airdrop pendants
text:
Something that lies beneath the floorboards. Something that is going to change everything...
Divine Ancestral Pendants are ERC-1155 tokens on Polygon from our Cre8ors Relics collection. Pendants
reward potential collective members and keep track of important on-chain metrics that help us curate
the best creator community on the internet. Collect 88 pendants by participating in community activities
and exchange them for a Cre8ors Passport.

label: Build in public
text:
Cre8ors is not your typical NFT project. It didn’t start with a product, alpha group, DAO, or PFP... yet.
It started with a simple mission and group of creators with shared values. We asked questions like “What
are the biggest problems creators face?” and learned a ton about co-creativity, community-bonding, and
all the different ways the Cre8ors brand can be built to help creators from all walks of life. Our products,
art, lore, and tech have been a labor of love created on daily Twitter Spaces together with the community.

label: Leaderboard
text:
The leaderboard is our way of transparently showcasing the status of all relic collectors. It’s
a celebration of our most active contributors holding the most pendants. The first 88 community
members to collect 88 pedants earn their place as founding members of the Cre8ors collective.
The 88 founders represent Cre8ors core community, those who built the brand from the ground up.

label: Claim tickets
text:
Claim Tickets are 721-A NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. Each Claim Ticket grants holders the
right to mint one of eight hundred and eighty eight Cre8ors Passports on June 30th 2023 via our
public launch party (in partnership with Magic Eden). Claim a Ticket and reserve a Passport for 88
pendants, 0.8 eth, or any variation of the two through our intuitive Polygon to Ethereum burning
bridge discount mechanism.
mobile_text:

blockchain. Each Claim Ticket grants holders the right to

reserve a Passport for 88 pendants, 0.8 eth, or any
variation of the two through our intuitive Polygon to
Ethereum burning bridge discount mechanism.

label: Redeem passports
text:
Burn a Cre8ors Claim Ticket to redeem a Cre8ors Passport on June 30th 2023 via
our public launch party in partnership with Magic Eden. Cre8ors Passport holders
get priority entry to all upcoming Cre8ors products and services, plus exclusive
access to the Cre8ors network, resources, and software tools.

label: Allowlist quiz
text:
To get on the allowlist (without a passport) take the Everything Corp Personality Quiz
Assessment. Once your application is submitted, share your results to move up the
review process. Follow @cre8orsNFT to be notified once your application is accepted.

label: drop trailer
text:
Our trailer and explainer was made by web3 content creation visionary @__Talley__
to help showcase what “The next generation of creativity” truly means for Cre8ors as
a web3 brand, community, and technology.

label: everything corp hack
text:
Get immersed in a digital experience to hack evil Everything Corp and restore color back to
the Black & White City. Learn more about our community created lore, and prove that you
have what it takes to become a Cre8or.

label: final dna distributions
text:
If your application is accepted, you’ll be notified via @Cre8orsNFT Twitter with your
personalized creative DNA archetype, granting you allowlist access. To check
application status visit cre8ors.com/applicationstatus.
